javadoc:
This class is used to convert a C language
 token group into readable C code.

methods.javadoc:
Constructs a new pretty printer using the specified C language token group.
@param tokgroup the C language token group
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new pretty printer using the specified C language token group.

methods.name: getLines
methods.comment:
Returns an array list of the C language lines contained in the
 C language token group.

return.comment: an array list of the C language lines

methods.name: print
methods.comment:
Prints the C language token group
 into a string of C code.

params.name: removeInvalidChars
params.comment:
true if invalid character should be
 removed from functions and labels.

return.comment: a string of readable C code

name: PrettyPrinter
comment:
This class is used to convert a C language
 token group into readable C code.

fields.javadoc: The indent string to use when printing.
fields.name: INDENT_STRING
fields.comment: The indent string to use when printing.
